DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled study . Seventy woman , age 35-75 year , treatment-emergent loss libido randomly allocate treatment Transdermal nanoemulsion Testosterone ( 500mcg ) deliver 300 mcg testosterone/day identical placebo nanoemulsion ( PLA ) 12 week .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study investigate efficacy transdermal testosterone nanoemulsion ( TNT ) treatment SSRI/SNRI-emergent loss libido . The primary outcome measure evaluate change Sabbatsberg Sexual Self-rating Scale ( SSS ) total score 12 week . The 4-week frequency Satisfactory Sexual Events ( SSEs ) Female Sexual Distress Scale-Revised ( FSDS-R ) also evaluate .
DOC.criteria: body mass index 18 27 kg/m2 ; Diminished libido ; Sexual behavior complaint ; No evidence severe clinical depression ; General good health base history physical examination . past history neurological disorder ; Poor feeling partner ; Had receive pharmacotherapy depression within 8 week screen Taking medication know interfere normal sexual function ( αblockers βblockers ) ; Recent psychiatric systemic illness ; Uncontrolled hypertension ( blood pressure > 160/95mmHg ) , Unstable cardiovascular disease , Genital bleeding ; Use psychoactive medication , alcohol excess consumption drug abuse ; Women go treatment acne , depression , dyspareunia .
